sections.text:
44-5243.Index rate, defined.

Index rate shall mean, for each class of business as to a rating period for small employers with similar case characteristics, the arithmetic average of the applicable base premium rate and the corresponding highest premium rate.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 1222, ยง 21.
